column4: how do I get ubunto to boot in to runlevel 3?  i don't want X running as i'm thinking of running this on a server.
runlevels on Ubuntu/debian do not work like other distributions. If you don't want X running, remove it from startup: sudo update-rc.d gdm remove
oh, right.  i was going to try that yesterday and got sidetracked.  thanks.  i'll try that.
